title: Bonus 35  In conversation with A Podcast of Biblical Proportions
itunes:title: Bonus: In conversation with A Podcast of Biblical Proportions
description: In this bonus episode I am joined by Omri Harel and Gil Kidron of the rambunctious podcast “A Podcast of Biblical Proportions” for a rambling discussion about things biblical.
content:encoded: In this bonus episode I am joined by Omri Harel and Gil Kidron of the rambunctious podcast “A Podcast of Biblical Proportions” for a rambling discussion about things biblical.
itunes:subtitle: In this bonus episode I am joined by Omri and Gil of the rambunctious podcast “A Podcast of Biblical Proportions” for a rambling discussion about things biblical.
itunes:author: Garry Stevens, Gil Kidron, Omri Harel
